content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 46, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 39, "index": 14}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 22}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "golden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft cyan stained glass, I need to first craft cyan dye, which requires blue dye and green dye. To craft green dye, I need to smelt cactus in slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
